struttura.settings.title: STRUTTURA Settings
struttura.settings.disclaimer.default: Set up your personal key (API Key) to customize your experience and use the cloud.
struttura.apikey.setup.title: API Key Setup
struttura.apikey.setup.step1: Create an account or sign in on
struttura.apikey.setup.step2: Create a new API Key in your dashboard
struttura.apikey.setup.step3: Copy your API Key and paste it here (Ctrl+V)
struttura.apikey.setup.step4: Press Connect to link your account
struttura.ingame.setup.title: The adventure begins!
struttura.ingame.setup.subtitle: Select a building list to explore in this world
struttura.ingame.setup.subtitle.error: Unable to connect to STRUTTURA server
struttura.ingame.setup.decline.hint: You can re-enable it with /struttura adventure init
STRUTTURA requires an internet connection to work.
Please check your connection and verify you can reach:
Buildings will be loaded on the next world start.
struttura.ingame.disabled: §a[Struttura]§f Adventure mode disabled. Use /struttura adventure init to enable it.
struttura.ingame.skipped: §a[Struttura]§f Adventure mode skipped. Will retry on next world load.
struttura.ingame.mods.detail.title: Required Mods
struttura.ingame.mods.warning: Warning: Missing or outdated mods may cause blocks and entities to not appear
struttura.like.title: Building Details
struttura.like.author: by %s
struttura.like.message: If you enjoyed this creation, give it a like to support the author!
struttura.like.default_description: This creation was built with passion by the architect to be enjoyed by all players.
struttura.toast.like_tutorial: Press ESC to like this building!
struttura.welcome.title: Welcome to STRUTTURA!
struttura.welcome.default_message:
STRUTTURA is active and ready to use in free mode!
Whether you are an Explorer or an Architect, there is something for you.

Explorer: Enjoy the most popular community buildings spawning in your world for endless adventures. Register for free on the STRUTTURA website to create your own custom lists and play the adventure your way!

Architect: Save your creations to the cloud for free! Organize them into lists and let other explorers play them. Receive likes, build your reputation, and use the cloud as a backup for your builds.

We recommend creating a free account on the STRUTTURA website to unlock all these features and get huge advantages over anonymous access.
struttura.first_push.title: Building Uploaded!
struttura.first_push.message:
Your building has been uploaded to the Struttura cloud!

For safety, it has been saved as PRIVATE. To make it public, visit struttura.magius.it and change the visibility in your dashboard.

Remember to:
- Upload screenshots to showcase your creation
- Add a description to help other players understand your build
- Set titles and descriptions in multiple languages so more players can find your work
